inclusion.criterion: Patients that will be able to sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: quote: Daughter also reports med compliance and compliance with BiPap at night.

inclusion.criterion: Established diagnosis of congestive heart failure

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient has multiple comorbidities and is currently on BIPAP, but daughter reports difficulty with ADLs and decreased appetite.
